summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 50, replat of Mercer's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue North and Taylor Avenue, from Roy Street to Valley Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103879 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
